name: Idle Particle Simulator
description:
=Just a heads up= EPILEPSY WARNING = Idle Particle Simulator = A game about particles and idling
the game is in VERY EARLY DEVELOPMENT thus the game is VERY UNBALANCED, would appreciate ANY feedback

1 Thing to note is that any cosmetic upgrade for the particles adds to their value

If you struggle with FPS, clicking the "V" key on your keyboard will limit the amount of particles drawn, that way you can still enjoy the game on low-end machines!
(Bottom Left tells you how many particles are being drawn)



= CHEATS = (added this for fun <3)

SHIFT + R = Restart Game
SHIFT + T = Add a lot of money
SHIFT + Y = Add 1,000 particles
